story:
Our first studio EP!

About us and our project

  • Foxanne is an independent rock band based out of NYC (with roots in NJ). We combine soulful singing and heartfelt songwriting with unbridled creativity and unique instrumental sounds.
  • We have released a demo EP and a couple of singles, but we have been writing and rehearsing super hard  to make a really incredible full studio EP
  • Getting this project means a lot to us, and we really just want to create the most incredible sounding music we can. We want to create a product that speaks for itself, and we hope that having some incredible people working with us on the production side of things in addition to the music we play will really help connect with people

Here's the details

What the money is going towards and what you can expect from us as a supporter

  • We are aiming to raise $2,000 to cover a major portion of the recording/mixing/mastering of the EP. We are funding part of it as well, but creating a beautiful professional sound will take our teamwork!
  • The money will be going towards booking studio time and paying a professional audio engineer to mix and master the album. This project is our baby, so we really don't want to half-ass this and ruin it by trying to do it ourselves.
  • We have HELLA perks for you too, from free merch and CDs to your name and talents featured alongside Foxanne!

Our vision

We will change the future of rock and roll!

  • Maybe we will? We just really believe in the music that we are making, I think that this is the culmination of years of hard work and writing and rehearsing, all to really understand how to create the sounds and convey the emotions necessary to really make people feel the music
  • We are a diligent hard working bunch of nerds, who all have a ton of experience working on other musical projects, so we understand and have much practice in studios and can get the job done. No heading into the studio with unfinished songs, no rewriting once we've started recording. We know what we're doing.
  • We will bring the rock. And the funk. We promise.

Other Ways You Can Help!

If you can't contribute financially (and we strongly recommend you do) that's okay! Here are some ways you can help...

  • You can share this campaign with other friends and let them know it's going on!
  • You can come out to shows and support us with heckling and hooting
  • You can let Rolling Stone know about us, and tell them that we are good. Yes. This is a good thing to do.


And That's It! 

Thank you to everyone who will and has supported us in any and every way

<3
story_txt:
Our first studio EP!

About us and our project
  Foxanne is an independent rock band based out of NYC (with roots in NJ). We combine soulful singing and heartfelt songwriting with unbridled creativity and unique instrumental sounds. We have released a demo EP and a couple of singles, but we have been writing and rehearsing super hard  to make a really incredible full studio EP Getting this project means a lot to us, and we really just want to create the most incredible sounding music we can. We want to create a product that speaks for itself, and we hope that having some incredible people working with us on the production side of things in addition to the music we play will really help connect with people

   Here's the details What the money is going towards and what you can expect from us as a supporter  We are aiming to raise $2,000 to cover a major portion of the recording/mixing/mastering of the EP. We are funding part of it as well, but creating a beautiful professional sound will take our teamwork!
The money will be going towards booking studio time and paying a professional audio engineer to mix and master the album. This project is our baby, so we really don't want to half-ass this and ruin it by trying to do it ourselves. We have HELLA perks for you too, from free merch and CDs to your name and talents featured alongside Foxanne!

   Our vision We will change the future of rock and roll!  Maybe we will? We just really believe in the music that we are making, I think that this is the culmination of years of hard work and writing and rehearsing, all to really understand how to create the sounds and convey the emotions necessary to really make people feel the music We are a diligent hard working bunch of nerds, who all have a ton of experience working on other musical projects, so we understand and have much practice in studios and can get the job done. No heading into the studio with unfinished songs, no rewriting once we've started recording. We know what we're doing. We will bring the rock. And the funk. We promise.





Other Ways You Can Help!If you can't contribute financially (and we strongly recommend you do) that's okay! Here are some ways you can help...
You can share this campaign with other friends and let them know it's going on!
You can come out to shows and support us with heckling and hooting
You can let Rolling Stone know about us, and tell them that we are good. Yes. This is a good thing to do.
And That's It! Thank you to everyone who will and has supported us in any and every way<3

story:
Latest update: I am very excited to announce that my debut single, “Boomerang” will be available for pre-order on iTunes — 16.08.16

 

Hello World!

I am Iana and I am an independent Singer/Songwriter based in Singapore.

Over the last year, I've ferreted out the three songs that most effectively and quickly represent what my music is all about, produced and co-written by an incomparable producer from Universal Music, who prefers to be anonymous. These tracks were recorded at The Analog Factory in Singapore.

I've weighed the various options and tried to record them cost effectively and efficiently, while I am able to fund  70% of the recording process for three tracks on my own and with the help of my parents, the time has come to put the necessary funds into this project that I hope will be a real turning point in my career.

It breaks my heart to not be able to make my music be heard because of a major setback. I have decided to put up a crowdfunding campaign on Indiegogo to seek for your monetary support.

I have set up a campaign goal of $1000 for my initial goal funding. In any case that this campaign has exceeded its initial campaign goal before or after this campaign is over, this campaign page will become an InDemand page and will no longer show days or hours left, no fundraising target and no deadline limits.

InDemand makes it easy for any successful campaigner to keep raising funds after their campaign ends. With InDemand, I can accept contributions even after my campaign ends, grow my community and reach new audiences, and  I will get ongoing exposure on the Indiegogo platform for as long as I like. 

 

Biography

Eirene Iana Mascariña Enriquez (born on 16 July 1994), better known as Iana, is a singer-songwriter based in Singapore. She is of Filipino, Spanish and Chinese descent and was born in San Pedro, Laguna, Philippines and was raised by her grandparents in an island province—Alabat, Quezon while her parents are working abroad to provide for the family.

Iana discovered her talent when she first performed for her grandfather’s election campaign show when she was just 7 years old, the crowd and their overwhelming response was her motivation in going into the arts scene.

In 2005, Iana and her family moved to Singapore. 

At 11 years old, she auditioned and became a member of the Singapore Symphony Children’s Choir, a classical chorale training ground with the Singapore Symphony Orchestra. At the age of 14, she was discovered by her then manager, Kuo Po, the creative director of Singapore’s premier performing arts school—Kids Performing™ where she was trained in singing, acting, dancing whilst performing for multitude of events for four years. Her musical debut started when she was offered a lead role in NARNIA, the Musical (the Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe).

Since then, Iana has been involved in various events, musicals and concerts such as the Straits Times’ annual charity concert ChildAid, Youth Olympic Games, Singapore Airshow, ASEAN School Games to name a few.

Iana was a secondary student of St. Anthony’s Canossian Secondary School and later on took the ALS (Alternative Learning System) to finish her secondary studies. After Secondary, she took a Diploma in Music Production in City College - SODE (School of Design and Entrepreneurship) for a year. Recently, she has been accepted into LASALLE College of the Arts and will start freshman year this August. 

Influences: Adele, Amy Winehouse, Christina Aguilera, Sia, Jessie J and Kelly Clarkson.

 

My goal is to pre-sell enough digital download of "Killer" and fabulous loot to fund this recording project.

I am working to raise at least $20,000 to cover the costs involved in recording, releasing and promoting a professional, full-length, studio album. Here's where the money is going:

  • Pre-production: this is where the songs and arrangements are worked out, overturned, ripped apart, thrown out, re-born, and put back together with a lot of time, sweat, energy, and talent.  
  • Studio Recording: this is where all the musicians and I, sound engineers, and their assistants come together to record the songs as you'll hear them on the finished album.  For me, this involves several days booked at the great Analog Factory in Singapore, with a stellar producer/engineer and his respective crew.  It also involves hiring top-gun studio musicians to help fill in the musical spaces with instrumentation that I personally don't play.
  • Mixing: this is where all the pieces of the musical puzzle get pulled together and shaped into a seamlessly beautiful and  balanced song.  This also involves several days with a skillful and talented mixing engineer. 
  • Mastering: this is a mysterious and magical part of the process. I don't exactly know what mastering engineers are doing in there, but mastering is what puts the shimmer and shine on to the finished mix.  It's an essential part of the finished song. 
  • CD & Album Manufacturing and Production: when the whole recording process it finished, this is the step that gets the actual CD or Vinyl into your hands. There are costs involved not only in the production of these physical beauties but also in the artwork, design & of course, shipping costs. It's not cheap to send 1,000 units of anything across the country. 
  • Marketing and Promotion: This is the arm of the whole process that gets little accolades, but easily is the most important link to getting my music out into the world and heard.  There are numerous costs involved in getting the right promotional materials, like posters, t-shirts, caps & bumper stickers. There's also costs in online and social media exposure.  Then there's the cost and time involved in booking shows and tours, arranging CD release parties, and then actually going out and playing these shows. 

In the end, there's are countless of other incidentals and extras that need to be paid for, one way or another–live musician fees, video production fees, transportation, food, time off from our jobs, and time away from our families. With all that said, I still feel blessed to be able to do what I love.  And I can guarantee you that I am trying to work my hardest at it.  Sometimes, though, it's still not enough to pay all the bills.

Indiegogo

Indiegogo's platform fee on all funds raised is 5%. Credit Card fees are charged by payments processor Stripe and per contribution.

 

You can make a difference.

Believe me, I know what it means to be strapped for cash. I know how it feels to work your ass off and still barely make the rent. I understand that not everyone can help with a pre-purchase or monetary donation, but that doesn't mean you can't help. 

Your help in spreading the word about my goal and my music would mean the world to me. Sharing my Indiegogo campaign to your Facebook page, Twitter feed or any other social media would be a great way to start. And there are tools offered here on Indiegogo that can help you with things like embedding the campaign onto your blog or website, or copying the link to share on social media.

Small acts change the world, here are other ways you can help:

  • Do you know any booking agent at a music venue?
  • Have a friend who prints band t-shirts or makes merch?
  • Know a talented graphic designer or photographer/videographer?
  • Do you have people who work in Press Relations?
  • Got a cousin or whoever who runs a music label and wants to sign me a 360-degree deal and send me all over the world? Kidding… but seriously, do you?
  • Have a better ideas than these? Great! Email me.

story:
Summary

“There’s a spaciousness and unrushed feeling to the music that mixes the timeless quality of the best of Indian music with the best of the Western harmonies and song structure, bringing out the strengths of each side of the planet. Excellently creative.” - Jazzweekly.com

Hi, my name is Dave Cipriani, and I’m asking for your help to finish my most ambitious musical album yet, “My Heart is Pierced” - the new album by the world music group Mahadev.

This album represents the next step in my evolution of combining music styles in a way that is organic and soulful.  It has a wide mix - many groove based compositions that are relatively simple to more complex pieces with tricky rhythms and breaks. Drawing on traditions of Indian, African, Balkan, and American musics, (I decided I even decided to include a Van Morrison song that I had a unique vision and horn arrangement for, including tabla and an Indian violinist)

I studied jazz with the great Charlie Byrd and attended masterclass with Christopher Parkening several years ago.  later, I studied in India on 20-string Indian Slide Guitar with Pandit Barun Kumar Pal, and more recently I greatly deepened my studies at California Institute of the Arts, with Pandit Swapan Chaudhuri and Randy Gloss, and most importantly with Ustad Aashish Khan, with whom I still study with when I can.  I also studied at CalArts with the great Balkan/Flamenco guitarist Miroslav Tadic, and with Stuart Fox, Vinnie Golia, David Roitstein, Larry Koonse and Milen Kirov.

I would say that this album, to date is the best summation of everything I have studied, and everyone I studied with over these many years. To further that, I have assembled the best group of musicians I’ve gotten together.  In addition to the regular group of 5 guys, I got several excellent musicians to lend their talents to this.  

The album features:
Mahadev (regular group):
Dave Cipriani - 7-string classical guitar, Indian Slide Guitar & vocals
Mike Mull: saxophones, clarinets
Dave Tranchina: Upright Bass
Chris Payne: Cajon, Congas, Drumkit, Shakers, Jank, Vibes
Jamie Papish: Riq, Daf, Triangle, Shakers, Quarkabeb (Moroccan Cymbals)
The extra awesome musicians:
Tahir Faridi Qawwal - Qawwali vocal solo on “Burning Sword of Wisdom”
Greg Zilborg: Trumpet
Leonice Shinneman: Tabla, Calabash
Indradeep Ghosh: - indian Violin
Dr. Neelamjit Dhillon - Tabla, Alto Saxophone
Robin Sukhadia - Tabla
Chris Votek - Cello
Clinton Patterson - Trumpet
Vikram Devasthali- Trombone
And I have to mention these people even if it is a 2nd time:
Chris Votek - recording & editing, string arranging
Clinton Patterson - overdub recording, Producing & general productive argumenting, mixing
Andrew Mudrock - session recording at Hobby Shop and feet-to-the-fire-holding 

What We Need

The album is nearly finished, there are a few final overdubs, but the main stuff left is to mix it, get artwork, get it out there.  I am trying to find a label and to hire a PR firm to promote the album to radio, TV/Film, etc.  The immediate impact will be to get the music reviewed, placed in TV or film, etc. Buzz generated.

Up to this point, I’ve paid for everything out of pocket, (which has indirectly increased my credit card debt…)

here is what the remaining money will go to:

  1. musician pay:       $200
  2. mix album:             $1000
  3. mastering:              $200
  4. CD replication:      $750
  5. CD design               $200
  6. hire PR firm             $1500
  7. cover song license $84 (for Van Morrison song)

total: $3934

We are looking to raise $4000.

If we are able to get above the amount for this, we will try to recoup the personal costs I have made, Here is a breakdown of what I’ve spent so far:

  1. musician pay:   $865
  2. recording/studio: $2660
  3. video documentation/editing: $500

total to date:$4025

What You Get

For some of the different levels of perks, you get to dig into mine and other members’ back catalogs, a treasury of music from some awesome musicians, plus some fun one’s like breakfast and live music for you!.

If we don’t reach the entire goal, the funds will be prioritized:

  1. mix & finish the album!
  2. get the CD design made
  3. get automated mastering (rather than by a human)
  4. print only CD’s on demand to fulfill the perks
  5. hire PR FlipSwitch
  6. print a full run of CD’s
The Impact

This is music that is simultaneously complex and reaches for the heart.  Musicians will dig hearing it, as well general listeners will get excited or touched by it.  This is the best work I’ve ever done, everyone that I have played it for agrees, close loved ones and friends as well as people new to my music. There are some moments that make the hair stand up on the back of my head.  I want everyone to hear it!

I like to think that I’m breaking some ground here in the realm of World music by bringing knowledge of several traditions together in the compositions and arrangements we have created here.  One song brings together Ravi Shankar style Indian composition with Miles Davis cool and instrumentation, with a Tibetan Buddhist chant to Manjushri, the Bodhisattva of Wisdom and Learning.   Others bring together African & Indian ideas, some Fela Kuti style afrobeat, even a little modern minimalist influence sprinkled in.  On one song I brought some Radiohead influence in, but you might not hear it over the Balkan melody with Latin grooviness and an Indian influenced ending. 

This music is ambitious yet accessible.  Many beautiful moments, lots of grooves with heart and emotion.

Risks & Challenges

The big risk is that the music falls outside of the norms, that it is too ambitious.  I think I have proven through various projects that I can make some great music, and I have gotten the best musicians and been the most slow moving on this album to make sure everything is as good as possible - work for the album first started in 2014, with several recording sessions that year, and a few last year.  Some of that has been because me and my amazing partner Emily had a baby boy in the fall of 2014 which has meant doing this project in its own time.

I picked Clinton Patterson to help co-produce and mix this album, due to the excellent work he did with Sheela Bringi and Premasoul, as well as his own solo stuff.

Will be working with FlipSwitchPR to get some noise about this, which will be tremendously helpful.  We are going to also try to find a label to distribute the album further.

How You can Help

I completely understand that not everyone is in a position to contribute financially. I've been there myself. Of course, there are other ways to show your support: 

  • spread the word on social media, post this webpage and video where others can see it and get excited about it!
  • volunteer time to help with organizing, emails, booking, etc
  • send good vibes and feelings

story:
The true story...

Hi yall, I'm Glitter Rose.  I've been blessed with the opportunity and the will to live my dreams as a songwriter and musician.  Sometimes, those dreams are a different reality than I envisioned, but I haven't had to follow anyone's rules but my own. I have the freedom and support to make music the way I envision it. In 17 years of doing so, I've loved, lost, learned, lived and most of all, overcome any obstacle that has presented itself, no matter how heartbroken, or soul-broken I may have been.

What I haven't done is let anyone in.  I haven't creatively exposed myself. For a long, long time, I kept my emotions at bay by writing music about other people, telling their stories, or making up characters all together.  I wanted people to have fun, I wanted people to feel good.  So I decided I didn't want to burden my fans with my feelings and struggles. 

What I've come to realize is that its ok to write about things that make me sad, or feel vulnerable.  Its ok to tell yall I'm in love, or that I'm confused.  Mainly, because you all feel these things too. I've noticed as I dig deep into my darkest crevices, and bring it to the surface, I'm healing and helping others.  Helping them understand and mend their wounds because now they see, I feel it too and through it all, I stay strong, hopeful, and know the most important thing in life is love whether it's family, friends or lovers, present or lost.  It always comes back around, in one way or another.

"Outlaw In Love" is my 3rd full length album as a solo artist, and it is my most honest, true, painful and inspiring collection of songs to date.  I experienced many kinds of love and heartbreak in the past 4 years.  Of course, the only way for an outlaw to love is with no rules, and it has resulted in some of the greatest and lowest moments of my life, but most of all, some of the best songs I've ever written.

Join me in my journey and experience the story of the girl I was, and the woman I'm becoming.  Meet an Outlaw In Love.

The logistics...

The fact is, it takes money to make an album.  There are ways to make it less expensive, but there are also corners that cannot be cut. Hard work and people who believe in what I do is how I've sustained in this business for 17 years.  I've been very blessed to have beautifully talented, good people on my team over the years.  

 This album is no different. My team is epic. I have an amazing band, an incredible engineer and recording partner, the best companies and individuals in the business supporting the project and undying support from my family, my friends and my fans.  We are going to make a professional, radio ready album that is going to inspire, evoke emotion and introduce people to a new GR and a new style of Southern Rock.  This will also be my first entirely self produced album. 

Here's a breakdown what we intend to do with the funds earned:

  • $2,000 - Studio Time
  • $2,000 - Engineer and Mixing
  • $1,500 - Mastering
  • $1,000 - Band and Additional Musicians
  • $2,000 - Reproduction of CD's, Artwork, and Distribution Fees
  • $1,500 - Processing Fees to Indiegogo (approx.)
  • $3,000 - Marketing/Promotion
  • $2,000 - Perks costs and shipping & handling
In return, we are offering some sweet perks, like:
  • Signed CD's and GR Swag packs
  • Exclusive VINYL packages
  • Private whiskey party with GR and the band
  • Be part of the studio audience for our Live Acoustic EP recording and Q&A
  • Be featured in a GR music video
  • Executive Producer credits and a day in the studio
  • ...and more

The impact...

By lending your support in making this record, you will be an integral part of the advancement of my career.  I'm at a level in my field that I will be able to get this album into the hands of people that can take it further and help it grow.  This album will also be submitted for GRAMMY consideration.

I am releasing this album as I have all of my others, completely independent.  Every sale, every stream, every blog or article, will all come down to me and my team making it happen.  I am not afraid of hard work, and that helps you know that what you contribute is being appreciated and put to good use. 

The challenge...

What if we don't reach our goal?  We will still make this album.  Its happening no matter what.  The difference in meeting our goal or not, is the impact the record will have and how far it can go.  It doesn't do us much good to record an album, and then have no funds to reproduce it or distribute it.  No one can benefit from the gift of music if they can't hear it.  Meeting our goal is crucial to the support of this album.

The ways you can help...

I understand more than anyone the struggles of today's economy, and that financially, times are tough.  My 3 years in LA have been rough and at one point, I was homeless.  I've also had several other creator friends run campaigns and even when I was sleeping in my truck on the beach, I donated the last $5 I had left in my account to help.   That's because I believe in artists and I believe in karma.  I couldn't do what I do without your support, and I want to lend that same support to the art I love and respect, and so on.  

If you can't donate any money, that's ok.  You can help by following this campaign and commenting on it here at Indiegogo.  You can also share this campaign on your Facebook wall, or blog about it, or tweet it.  Maybe send an email to your music loving friends and ask if they can spread the word too.  

Ultimately, its really not about money.  It's about spreading the word, and gaining new believers.  Its about music, love, hope and inspiration.  Money can't buy any of that.  What money does is help it manifest into a product that can be enjoyed by the masses.  If you aid in me gaining a new fan, you've contributed to this project.  

Anything, and everything, helps.

Thank you for taking the time to learn about my project and listen to my story.  I can't wait for you all to see the benefits of believing in and support this album.  Until then... this outlaw is sending her love. Rock on! GR

https://secure.elenos.com/index.php/default/etg...

ITALIANO
Ciao! Abbiamo bisogno di un nuovo Trasmettitore FM per continuare a diffondere i nostri programmi trascendentali e la musica devozionale nell'etere. Per favore contribuisci con la tua gentile donazione, otterrai molti benefici spirituali eterni e un riconoscimento personale sul sito di RKC: il tuo nome, il tuo logo o se preferisci, un mattoncino ricordo nella pagina degli sponsor/donatori !

http://www.radiokrishna.com/sponsor_new/

Grazie molte, Hare Krishna !

ENGLISH
Hello !  We need a new FM Trasmitter to continue spreading our transcendental shows and devotional music on the air. Please contribute with your kind donation, you will receive many eternal, spiritual benefits and a personal recognition on RKC website: your name, your logo or, if you prefer, a brick of the wall at the sponsor/donors page !

http://www.radiokrishna.com/sponsor_new/

Thanks a lot, Hare Krishna!


ESPANOL
Hola! Necesitamos un nuevo transmisor FM para seguir difundiendo nuestros espectáculos trascendental y música devocional en el aire. Por favor, colabore con su generosa donación, recibirá muchos beneficios eternos espiritual, y un reconocimiento personal en el sitio de RKC: su nombre, su logotipo o, si lo prefiere, un ladrillo de la pared en la página de los patrocinadores / donantes !

http://www.radiokrishna.com/sponsor_new/

Muchas gracias, Hare Krishna !


ITALIANO
In riconoscenza della tua gentile donazione, se lo desideri avremo piacere di pubblicizzare il tuo nome, il tuo sito, blog o pagina web (di social network ecc.) su RKC nella sezione "Donatori e Sponsor":
http://www.radiokrishna.com/sponsor_new
per i tempi previsti in base al contributo.

Scegli la soluzione ("Perk") che preferisci e facci sapere i dettagli che vuoi pubblicizzare, all'indirizzo email rkcpisa@gmail.com o agli altri recapiti di RKC.
Se preferisci, compra un mattoncino ricordo nella pagina degli sponsor/donatori !

http://www.radiokrishna.com/sponsor_new/

Il portale di Radio Krishna Centrale e' on line da oltre 10 anni ed e' attualmente visitato da Migliaia di persone al giorno. Ecco alcune statistiche:

piu' di 5.270.000 di pagine viste in totale
piu' di 5.000 pagine viste al giorno
piu' di 2.300 "fan" su facebook
piu' di 800 iscritti al forum
Migliaia di ascolti/download o in Streaming dall'archivio audio-video di RKC ogni giorno
piu' di 40.000 visualizzazioni su youtube
piu' di 115.000 libri on line distribuiti

Grazie ancora del tuo contributo, Hare Krishna !


ENGLISH
In appreciation of your kind donation, we are pleased to publicize your name, your site, blog or web page (on social networks etc.) on RKC website at the section "Donors and Sponsors":
http://www.radiokrishna.com/sponsor_new
for the scheduled time according to the contribution.

Choose your preferred solution ("Perk") and let us know the details you want to advertise to the email address rkcpisa@gmail.com or to the other contacts of RKC.
If you prefer, buy a brick of the wall at the sponsor/donors page !

http://www.radiokrishna.com/sponsor_new/

Radio Krishna Centrale portal is on line from over 10 years and is currently visited by thousands of people every day. Here are some statistics:

more than 5.27 million page views in total
more than 5,000 page views a day
more than 2,300 "fans" on facebook
more than 800 members of the forum
Thousands of plays / downloads / streams from audio video archive every day
more than 40,000 views on youtube
more than 115,000 online books distributed

Thanks again for your contribution, Hare Krishna !


ESPANOL
En agradecimiento por su generosa donación, nos complace dar a conocer tu nombre, tu sitio, blog o página web (de redes sociales, etc.) en el sitio de RKC,  en las seccion "RKC Sponsors & Donors":
http://www.radiokrishna.com/sponsor_new
para el tiempo de acuerdo a la contribución.

Elija la solucion ("Perk") que usted prefiere y deja saber nos los detalles que desee hacer publicidad a el dirección de correo electrónico rkcpisa@gmail.com o a otros contactos de RKC. Si lo prefiere, compra un ladrillo de la pared en la página de los patrocinadores / donantes !

http://www.radiokrishna.com/sponsor_new/

El portal de Radio Krishna Centrale es en línea desde más de 10 años y es actualmente visitados por miles de personas al día. Aquí algunas estadísticas:

más de 5.270.000 páginas vistas en total
más de 5.000 páginas vistas al día
más de 2300 "fans"en Facebook
más de 800 miembros del foro
Miles de obras de play / descargas / Streaming desde el archivo audio/video de RKC cada día
más de 40.000 visitas en youtube
más de 115.000 libros en línea distribuida

Gracias de nuevo por su contribución, Hare Krishna !

story:
Whats up my people?!

Here's a quick update on what we are doing in the last 3 days of this campaign.

Our goal has changed (or rather we actually have a real goal now) 100% of donations given in the next 3 days will be going towards funding a mission trip  that the 3 of us are headed out on in June. But as i said, theres ONLY 3 DAYS LEFT TO CONTRIBUTE!

So if God placed it on your heart to support, now is your final chance.

Thanks so much to those of you who have been giving, without your help we would be doing all of this alone. So thank you from each of us and our families for helping us shoulder the load.

Tom (R.E.F.)

story:
THE GOAL // LA META
Thank you so much for your interest in this campaign!, Ferrer is an Ecuadorian  Independent Music project that due to our achievements in our country, has been granted with interest to become a whole Latin American and U.S. music project! As a leader of the project, Songwriter and Creative Director, my goal is to finish our record in a great studio and get to the most professional Latin Music Market, but we need your help to achieve it! 

- We created the First Augmented Reality Music Video in whole Latin America!

- One of our songs was part of the promotional Ads from a Colombian Soap Opera in Ecuador!

- We create the First 3D mapping Music video on a live show in Ecuador!

We strongly believe that this project with these kind of unique innovations can be a huge success in U.S. and the world's Spanish Latin Market, but we need to be in the right place with the right quality!

I was granted with an scholarship to study at Berklee College of Music for a Master degree, I've been learning a lot to contribute for this production!
Help Us supporting this project! We have unique returns for you and we will have you always in our hearts!
----------------------------------------

Muchas gracias por tu interés en esta campaña !, Ferrer es un proyecto ecuatoriano  que debido a nuestros logros en nuestro país, hemos sido invitados a convertirnos en un proyecto para toda Latinoamérica y USA! Como líder del proyecto, compositor y director creativo, mi objetivo es terminar nuestro álbum en un gran estudio en Europa y llegar a los más profesionales renombrados de  la Música Latina, pero necesitamos tu ayuda para lograrlo!

  • Hemos creado el Primer Video Musical en Realidad Aumentada de toda América Latina!
  • Una de nuestras canciones fue parte de los anuncios promocionales de una telenovela Colombiana en Ecuador!
  • Creamos el Primer Video Musical en 3D Mapping en un show en vivo en Ecuador!

Creemos firmemente que este proyecto con este tipo de innovaciones únicas puede ser un gran éxito en Estados Unidos y en el mundo Latino, pero tenemos que estar en el lugar adecuado con la calidad adecuada!

Me concedieron  una beca para estudiar un Master en Berklee College of Music,  aprendido mucho para aportar en esta producción!

Ayúdanos apoyando este proyecto! Tenemos Retornos Exclusivos para ti y por siempre serás parte de esta familia! 

What We Need // Lo que Necesitamos

Our goal is to raise usd$6000 to finish this record production and to support our team during the stay in L.A. showcasing our work. Both concepts demand expensive costs, but with your help we can make it real! We have put so much effort, honesty and love to this project.

 This budget goal mainly includes:

  • Fees for the 5 musicians + transport and accomodation during rehearsals and recording days.
  • Mixing and mastering of the album.
  • Printing the physical copies of the album (CD)
  • Video crew for a professional promotional video and documenting of the process!

---------------------------------------

Nuestro objetivo es recaudar USD $ 6000 para terminar esta producción discográfica y para apoyar a nuestro equipo durante la estancia en Los Ángeles mostrando nuestro trabajo. Ambos conceptos exigen altos costos , pero con tu ayuda podemos hacerlo realidad ! Hemos puesto mucho esfuerzo, honestidad y amor a este proyecto.

 Este presupuesto incluye principalmente :

  • Las tarifas para los 5 músicos + transporte y alojamiento durante los ensayos y los días de grabación.
  • La mezcla y masterización del álbum .
  • Impresión de las copias físicas del álbum ( CD)
  • Equipo de vídeo para un vídeo promocional profesional y documentación del proceso !

& What You Get //Lo que recibirás

We would love to give you exclusive incentives thanking your support! Every little or big amount would have a great reward! 
  • Signed Album (CD) before official release
  • Personalized Booklet with your name and regarding your support
  • Free Download of the album, weeks before the official release.
  • Music Scores from any song of the album you want to learn and play with your band
  • Songwriting Master class checking your lyrics
  • A pre - production of one of your songs, letting it ready to record. 
  • Your company logo,  brand or your name and service, in the album, tour events and promo videos! and much More!! 
All of these different options and more are listed in detail on the right hand side of this page.
-------------------------------------------------

Te daremos incentivos exclusivos agradeciendo tu apoyo! Cada cantidad pequeña o grande tendrá una gran recompensa !

  • Álbum Autografiado (CD ) antes de su lanzamiento oficial
  • Folleto personalizado con tu nombre y agradecimiento. 
  • Descarga gratuita del álbum, semanas antes de su lanzamiento oficial.
  • Partituras de cualquier canción del álbum que desees aprender y tocar con tu banda
  • Taller de Songwriting chequeando la letra de una canción tuya.
  • Un pre - producción de una de tus canciones , dejándola lista para grabar.
  • El logo de tu empresa, tu marca o tu nombre y tu servicio, en el cover del  álbum , conciertos y videos promocionales como auspiciante oficial!

Todas estas diferentes opciones y más se enumeran en detalle en la parte derecha de esta página.

Can't Donate? No worries! Spread the word! We have something for you!

  • We would like to give away a free song of our project that is trending right now in Ecuador for you in exchange of the share of this post! 
  • Please share it in all your social media! Using the hashtag #FerrerMuchMore 
If you don't receive your free mp3 song please contact me at ferrermusica@gmail.com 
-----------------------------------------------

Nos gustaría regalarte una canción gratis de nuestro proyecto que está sonando en este momento en Ecuador a cambio de compartir esta campaña!

Por favor, compártelo en todas tus redes sociales ! Usando el hashtag #FerrerMuchoMas

Si no recibes tu canción mp3 gratis por favor comuníquese conmigo a ferrermusica@gmail.com


Thank you! Welcome to this story... //Bienvenid@ a esta historia! 

It's a honor to have you on our team! We really appreciate your effort to help us making this career a dream come true! We are hardworking people that love what we do and want this project to last forever! 
This is No Fame, No Ego, No 15 minutes, this is PURE HONEST MUSIC AND WORK!
Thank you from the bottom of our hearts!
If you want to know more about the project or have any question please contact me using the email bellow. 

Thank you so much! 
Jonathan
& all the musicians and Team of FERRER. 
---------------------------------------------------

Es un honor tenerte en nuestro equipo ! Realmente apreciamos tu esfuerzo para ayudarnos a hacer esta carrera un sueño hecho realidad ! Somos gente trabajadora que amamos lo que hacemos y queremos que este proyecto dure para siempre !

Esto no es la fama , no es el ego ,  no son los 15 minutos , esto es música HONESTA, PURA Y LLENA DE TRABAJO !

¡Gracias desde el fondo de nuestros corazones!

Si quieres saber más sobre el proyecto o tienes alguna pregunta por favor contáctanos al correo electrónico

¡Muchas gracias!

Jonathan 

& todos los músicos y equipo de FERRER .
story_txt:
THE GOAL // LA META
Thank you so much for your interest in this campaign!, Ferrer is an Ecuadorian  Independent Music project that due to our achievements in our country, has been granted with interest to become a whole Latin American and U.S. music project! As a leader of the project, Songwriter and Creative Director, my goal is to finish our record in a great studio and get to the most professional Latin Music Market, but we need your help to achieve it! 
- We created the First Augmented Reality Music Video in whole Latin America!
- One of our songs was part of the promotional Ads from a Colombian Soap Opera in Ecuador!
- We create the First 3D mapping Music video on a live show in Ecuador!
We strongly believe that this project with these kind of unique innovations can be a huge success in U.S. and the world's Spanish Latin Market, but we need to be in the right place with the right quality!
I was granted with an scholarship to study at Berklee College of Music for a Master degree, I've been learning a lot to contribute for this production!
Help Us supporting this project! We have unique returns for you and we will have you always in our hearts!----------------------------------------
Muchas gracias por tu interés en esta campaña !, Ferrer es un
proyecto ecuatoriano  que debido a nuestros logros en nuestro
país, hemos sido invitados a convertirnos en un proyecto para toda Latinoamérica y USA! Como líder del proyecto, compositor y
director creativo, mi objetivo es terminar nuestro álbum en un gran estudio
en Europa y llegar a los más profesionales renombrados de  la Música Latina,
pero necesitamos tu ayuda para lograrlo!



Hemos creado el Primer Video Musical en Realidad Aumentada de toda América Latina!



Una de nuestras canciones fue parte de los anuncios
promocionales de una telenovela Colombiana en Ecuador!



Creamos el Primer Video Musical en 3D Mapping en un show en vivo en
Ecuador!



Creemos firmemente que este proyecto con este tipo de
innovaciones únicas puede ser un gran éxito en Estados Unidos y en el mundo
Latino, pero tenemos que estar en el lugar adecuado con la
calidad adecuada!
Me concedieron  una beca para estudiar un Master en Berklee College
of Music,  aprendido mucho para aportar en esta
producción!
Ayúdanos
apoyando este proyecto! Tenemos Retornos Exclusivos para ti y por siempre serás parte de esta familia! 
   What We Need // Lo que Necesitamos
Our goal is to raise usd$6000 to finish this record production and to support our team during the stay in L.A. showcasing our work. Both concepts demand expensive costs, but with your help we can make it real! We have put so much effort, honesty and love to this project.

 This budget goal mainly includes:

Fees for the 5 musicians + transport and accomodation during rehearsals and recording days.
Mixing and mastering of the album.
Printing the physical copies of the album (CD)
Video crew for a professional promotional video and documenting of the process!




---------------------------------------
Nuestro objetivo es recaudar USD $ 6000 para terminar esta
producción discográfica y para apoyar a nuestro equipo durante la estancia en Los
Ángeles mostrando nuestro trabajo. Ambos conceptos exigen altos costos , pero
con tu ayuda podemos hacerlo realidad ! Hemos puesto mucho esfuerzo, honestidad
y amor a este proyecto.
 Este presupuesto incluye principalmente :



Las tarifas para los 5 músicos + transporte y alojamiento durante
los ensayos y los días de grabación.



La mezcla y masterización del álbum .



Impresión de las copias físicas del álbum ( CD)


Equipo
de vídeo para un vídeo promocional profesional y documentación del proceso !


& What You Get //Lo que recibirás
We would love to give you exclusive incentives thanking your support! Every little or big amount would have a great reward! 

Signed Album (CD) before official release

Personalized Booklet with your name and regarding your support

Free Download of the album, weeks before the official release.

Music Scores from any song of the album you want to learn and play with your band

Songwriting Master class checking your lyrics

A pre - production of one of your songs, letting it ready to record. 

Your company logo,  brand or your name and service, in the album, tour events and promo videos! and much More!! 

All of these different options and more are listed in detail on the right hand side of this page.

-------------------------------------------------

Te daremos incentivos exclusivos agradeciendo tu
apoyo! Cada cantidad pequeña o grande tendrá una gran recompensa !


Álbum Autografiado (CD ) antes de su lanzamiento oficial
Folleto personalizado con tu nombre y agradecimiento. 
Descarga gratuita del álbum, semanas antes de su
lanzamiento oficial.
Partituras de cualquier canción del álbum que desees aprender y tocar con tu banda
Taller de Songwriting chequeando la letra de una canción tuya.
Un pre - producción de una de tus canciones , dejándola lista para grabar.
El logo de tu empresa, tu marca o tu nombre y tu servicio, en el cover del  álbum , conciertos y videos promocionales como auspiciante oficial!

Todas
estas diferentes opciones y más se enumeran en detalle en la parte derecha de esta
página.


Can't Donate? No worries! Spread the word! We have something for you!


We would like to give away a free song of our project that is trending right now in Ecuador for you in exchange of the share of this post! 

Please share it in all your social media! Using the hashtag #FerrerMuchMore 

If you don't receive your free mp3 song please contact me at ferrermusica@gmail.com 
-----------------------------------------------

Nos gustaría regalarte una canción gratis de nuestro proyecto
que está sonando en este momento en Ecuador a cambio de compartir esta campaña!
Por favor, compártelo en todas tus redes sociales ! Usando el hashtag #FerrerMuchoMas
Si no recibes tu canción mp3 gratis por favor comuníquese conmigo a ferrermusica@gmail.com




Thank you! Welcome to this story... //Bienvenid@ a esta historia! 
It's a honor to have you on our team! We really appreciate your effort to help us making this career a dream come true! We are hardworking people that love what we do and want this project to last forever! 
This is No Fame, No Ego, No 15 minutes, this is PURE HONEST MUSIC AND WORK!
Thank you from the bottom of our hearts!
If you want to know more about the project or have any question please contact me using the email bellow. 

Thank you so much! Jonathan
& all the musicians and Team of FERRER. 
---------------------------------------------------

story:
Die Pfadihütte in Furx braucht dich.

Unvergessliche Erinnerung und Erlebnisse verbinden viele mit der Hütte Ratti der Gruppe St. Georg Feldkirch auf der Furx. Erlebnisse aus eigener Jugend wie Winterlager, Versprechensfeiern, legendäre Kissenschlachten, Rodelpartien im Winter, Hüttenabende, das Holzsägen, gruselige Geistergeschichten und Vieles mehr. Nicht zu vergessen der markante Balken über der Türe in die Küche, welcher für so manche Beule verantwortlich war. 

Für Pfadfinder aus dem ganzen Lande, Schulklassen und Lehrlings- sowie Jugendprojekte hat die Hütte Raum für Lager, Projektwochen, Ausbildungswochenenden und etliches mehr geboten.

Vor über 50 Jahren wurde die damals einfache Hütte erworben und in mehreren kleineren Schritten von den Pfadfindern umgebaut und hergerichtet. 

Warum neu bauen?

Heute ist die über ca. 150 Jahre alte Bausubstanz in einem solch schlechten Zustand, dass eine Sanierung des Tragwerks und ein Umbau auf die heute für eine Nutzung erforderlichen Anforderungen einen unverhältnismäßig großen finanziellen Aufwand erfordert. 

So wird die neue Furx-Hütte aussehen.

Der Elternrat traf die Entscheidung zum Neubau im Herbst 2014 – keine leichte Entscheidung, da viele von uns die Hütte seit vielen Jahren liebgewonnen hatten. Aber die Aussicht auf eine zeitgemäße und sichere Hütte ist auch ein Grund zur Freude.

Warum brauchen wir deine Unterstützung?

Der Neubau der Hütte ist für unseren Verein eine große Herausforderung. Glücklicherweise mangelt es uns nicht an fleißigen Helferinnen und Helfern. Vielmehr brauchen wir deine finanzielle Unterstützung für:

Waschräume inklusive Duschen

Vor 50 Jahren war es noch nicht so wichtig, aber heutzutage sind getrennte Waschräume und Sanitäranlagen für Burschen und Mädchen Standard. Mit unserer ersten Aktion bitten wir euch alle um euren Beitrag.

Ein kleines (oder großes) Dankeschön für dich

Wir haben uns für Spenden in jeder Höhe Geschenke für dich ausgedacht: vom Uniform-Aufnäher, Schindeln der alten Hütte über T-Shirts bis zur Käsknöpflepartie für dich und deine Freunde in der neuen Hütte: wir danken dir herzlich für deine Hilfe. Auf der rechten Seite siehst du unsere Dankeschön-Artikel.

Paypal oder Überweisung

Du kannst hier direkt auf dieser Seite mit Paypal und Kreditkarte spenden und dir ein Dankeschön sichern. Wenn du lieber eine Überweisung machen möchtest, unser Spendenkonto lautet: 

Unser Spendenkonto:
Inhaber: Pfadfinder St. Georg Feldkirch
Bank: Sparkasse Feldkirch
Betreff: dein gewünschtes Dankeschön + Adresse
IBAN:  AT13 2060 4031 0155 1707
BIC:    SPFKAT2BXXX

Herzlichen Dank für deine Unterstützung
und gut Pfad!

Sigrid Sonderegger, Elternratsobfrau
Rainer Ebenhoch, Gruppenleiter

story:
We will be performing as a part of Dublin Choral Festival June 22 to 26, 2016. DEARBORN HIGH SCHOOL will represent Michigan in Dublin Choir Festival and American Celebration of Music in Britain. Men and women from Dhs who are at mixed levels will sing together as a community with other talented youth. We depart from Windsor and go sightseeing through Dublin. 

Enriching youths lives with culture and music is an experience teens will never forget. We sing all together on June 27 in the 900 year old Southwark Cathedral. This is a bonding experience that brings people together. Singing is an art than comes straight from the heart and it fulfills a need to give back. I truly love to sing and singing with my peers and friends makes me feel like I'm giving to others what I love.

 Youth now a days do not get the opportunity to travel or sing, let alone travel and sing beautiful music with people they love. This is an amazing experience that i hope to live.  I think, as a 16 year old boy, as a male singer, it is very important for today's youth to really experience what life is like when you do something you love.

story:
Lindsay Jarrett is a Scottish heroine, an ex police inspector, former model and international disabled Climber.  We need you to donate today to make sure there is a tomorrow  for Lindsay and her family.

Early in 2015 a group of Lindsay's friends decided that we had to help Lindsay and her family.

We decided to set up a charitable foundation to help make life more bearable and comfortable for the whole family. We have a central trust fund and hope to set up regional groups to set up charitable events and activities that can hopefully go some way to providing a perpetuity fund for both the immediate and then ongoing needs of Lindsay and her kids.

Our immediate target is to buy a van (Volkswagon Transporter) that will enable Lindsay to get out with her children, this would be an ideal solution as it would accommodate Lindsay's wheelchair and life sustaining oxygen equipment, as well as the kids as at present she cannot get out and about without the help of others following in a second car.

We hope to prioritise Lindsay's needs and we are also looking at a motorised chair, scooter etc.

In a proper caring society the Welfare system would look after all of Lindsay and her family's needs, but unfortunately Lindsay does not qualify for this type of help as she is under 65yrs old.

We as friends of Lindsay are also very aware of potentially life saving research and trials for Alpha-1-antitrypsin deficiency (AATD), we aim to do everything we can to see that Lindsay has every chance to explore all avenues to get access to this stem cell treatment, which is not currently available anywhere in UK to access this treatment will cost in excess of £300,000, hence our target here.

Lindsay has personally given so much of herself in helping other charities via climbing activities to raise funds and awareness, so we hope and pray that we can do likewise for this truly inspirational woman who has touched the hearts of the whole of Scotland and beyond. We are appealing to the whole of the country to get onboard and help us give the whole Jarrett family the quality of life that we all know they deserve.

Lindsay herself has declared us, the Scottish People, as her "Babysitters" after she has gone, we have made a pledge to honour that position that she

has bestowed upon us we will not let her down.

Lindsay's Babysitters

story:
Hello there!

Thank you for taking your time to click on this campaign. My name is Mackenzie Yorke and I am a 14 year old girl who likes to make people happy and put smiles on their faces. I believe that us as humans need to work together and keep the world peaceful and at ease. What better way to do that then to make someone else smile? :)

You see, I have noticed that collectively, us humans are not holding up their end of the bargain and there is  more aggression and anger in some parts of the world then peace and love. Specifically, I am talking about the war going on in Afghanistan.

As a child myself, I couldn't imagine what fear and sorrow the kids living in Afghanistan must face each day. After awhile, these kids must get quite sad and just want to smile, have fun, and just be kids again! I plan to help them smile by giving them the gift of music, a recorder!

Anytime I am sad, I like to listen to music or make my own and I want children who are faced with fear and worry and sadness to just get a chance to let it all out through the music they'll create with their new recorders. I think music in itself is healing. It is an expression of humanity; something we are all touched by regardless of race or religion that will always put a smile on someones face.

 

   

Where will the $$$ Go?

All of the money raised from this campaign will go towards the purchasing of:

  • Recorders

  • Recorder cleaning tools

  • Books that teach children how to play the recorder and basic knowledge about music

  • Sheet music for various songs to learn and play.

I strive to raise enough money to purchase 50 recorders for the children in the town of Samangan, along with 50 sets of recorder cleaning tools, 50 books to teach the children how to play the recorder and 100 sets of sheet music. If I do not reach my $500 goal for this campaign, I will buy as many recorders, books, cleaning tools and sheet music as I can with the money that was donated and then donate the remaining money to various charities in Afghanistan.

 

The Impact

 

Just think to yourself for a second. Think of how your donation will impact a child’s life. The donation you make, no matter how big or small will help to provide a child that is scared for their life each day with an escape from reality. The music that they play and create is more than just a song to them. It will be a feeling of safety, security and reassurance that everything will be alright in the end. Music has the power to do that to someone. The children will stop feeling worried and smile again, you will be helping to make people happy!

 

Risks & Challenges

 

I am aware that this is an ambitious goal to try and reach but what is life without some faith and ambition anyway? Considering that I am only a young girl, it may be difficult to get this campaign up and running. I hope that can move past this obstacle and help make people happy. Everyone deserves happiness and any little bit you can do to help that come to be is appreciated.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Your donations will mean more to this campaign then you will ever know, but there are other ways to help! Tell your friends, family, neighbors, dog sitters, ANYONE about this campaign and ask them for their support as well. Together, we can put smiles on the faces of the next generation.

story:
I started playing guitar when I was 8 years old. I started writing songs when I was 13 and it's been my main dream to write and record an album since then. It's even more exciting to think of the opportunity indiegogo presents to team with all of you to make it happen.

Through many passionate, talented and kind musicians, technicians and friends, I have been able to get very far with few costs. However, as bigger costs compile, I realize that I won't be able to tackle them all on my own accord. Feel free to donate towards something specifically. Just make a note and I'll make sure your funds go towards that line item. Also remember to check out the "Perks"! (benefits of donating). Here they are:

Album Mastering with ResoSound: $525 - [50/song + tax @ 5%]. http://www.resosound.com/index.php

Album Art & Promo Material through Dustin Wiebe: $500. http://www.dustinwiebe.com/people#1

Printing through Precision Disc: $1297 - [$1140 printing costs + tax @ 5% + ~$100 shipping]. http://predisc.com/

TuneCore Membership: $30. TuneCore is a digital music distribution company that honours its artists highly as far as music rights are concerned. They distribute my music to iTunes, Amazon, GooglePlay, etc. for $30/year. Unbelievable! http://www.tunecore.com/

Manitoba Music Membership: $50. This membership has a lot of benefits where I live including helping me get gigs. It also lowers my theatre rental cost by $140. http://www.manitobamusic.com/

Park Theatre Rental Cost: $640. I'm renting the Park Theatre for my album release concert! http://www.parktheatrecafe.com/

Altogether, the total is $3042. I'm not expecting to fund raise this full amount, but let's see how far we can get!

Thanks for reading and considering this project,

// Brandon Post

TuneCore is a digital music distribution company that honours its artists highly as far as music rights are concerned. They distribute my music to iTunes, Amazon, GooglePlay, etc. for $30/year. Unbelievable! http://www.tunecore.com/Manitoba Music Membership: $50. This membership has a lot of benefits where I live including helping me get gigs. It also lowers my theatre rental cost by $140. http://www.manitobamusic.com/Park Theatre Rental Cost: $640. I'm renting the Park Theatre for my album release concert! http://www.parktheatrecafe.com/Altogether, the total is $3042. I'm not expecting to fund raise this full amount, but let's see how far we can get!Thanks for reading and considering this project,// Brandon Post

story:
Hello, my name is Justin Faulkner and I am a musician from Philadelphia, PA, "The City of Brotherly Love". Growing up in the city where music is truly a second language to most has its perks and privileges, but in the same breath has its responsibilities. Little did I know those responsibilities at the tender age of 3. 

Growing up I had the honor and privilege of living in West Philadelphia where my parents moved after their journey from the south during the early stages of their childhood. I learned from my experiences in church that I loved the drums and my parents supported that early on. My first few single drums then drum kits were purchased and destroyed by an eager young kid that was hungry for more than just a paper drumhead. Finally, after getting my first professional drum kit a gentleman knocked on my door and offered me a paying gig at the age of 13. Jamaladeen Tacuma, great bassist of Ornette Coleman's group Primetime, gave me a chance. Fast forward 3 years I went on my first tour of the US and Europe with a pianist named Orrin Evans. That same year I met a gentleman named  Branford Marsalis and he asked me to join the stage with his band for a gig and 2 years later I was the newest member in his band. 


To think that was the end of the line would have been foolish. A young man name Nazir Ebo was born, he's my younger brother, and just took all of the music in his life and created a truly unique and honest way of playing. He is currently the principal bass of his school orchestra, the Musicopia Young People's Orchestra and a semi professional drummer a the age of 15. Not to mention he plays and takes all of my gigs when I'm on the road. I am truly proud of the man he is becoming.

With that said it’s clear that my family believes in then potential of the youth and will support them when opportunity comes their way.  Through their support of Nazir and I, we were given a reason to believe that we can achieve anything if we put our deepest effort into it. As a result I want to do that for someone else's child. Some of the young people in the area that I come from don't have that push or helping hand thats needed to realize their gifts. It is a pleasure to say that our festival will show young people that those gifts are special and , "it's possible to make your dream a reality".  

Our Festival is going to be a what we like to call, "a day to remember". From the live performances, inspirational speeches from our city and state dignitaries to games, face painting, and of course the amazing food, this will be a moment where all differences are put aside and as a human race our community will come together to show our young people that creativity has no color, only a soul. Our motto/mantra, “Put down the guns and pick up an instrument,"is a universal call to action. For every bullet that has ended the life of someone's child there is a song that can help to heal the wound and fill that empty place with love and compassion. We know that because our family suffered two tragic deaths to gun violence. Both of the gentlemen happened to be my cousins that were raised with me like brothers. It was absolutely devastating, but in those times of darkness music brought light. Everyone would sing songs  and come together to lift the spirits of our elders and the kids of the family. After those events it was evident that the song of our future lies in the hands of the youth and I believe this year's festival will be the beginning of that new song.

At the Community Unity Music Festival we have created the, "Each One Teach One Coalition", which gives five (5) deserving students a scholarship for private lessons with the distinguished faculty of one of our partners The Clef Club for Jazz and the Performing Arts. This is the premier portion of our festival. We hope this program will help create the new artistic generation and properly groom them by teaching the FOUNDATION of what it takes to be great musician.  

Besides the amazing feeling of helping someone's child achieve greatness we will be awarding you for your gracious efforts and kind donations. 

$1000- Friend of The Community Unity Music Festival 

With a pledge of $1,000 and above  you will receive the perks of Giver of Hope and Cheerful Giver as well as acknowledgement in all event social media platforms as a, “Friend of the Community Unity Music Festival”. Your name or company logo will also appear on the official festival flyer.  You will also receive a reservation for (3) to attend our official Meet and Greet immediately after the festival. This will be a beautiful gathering of Philadelphia's finest artists and creative minds in one room to help benefit the youth of our community.  Last, but not least, you will receive (3) complementary VIP seats in the reserved section of our festival. 

$500- Neighbors of the Community Unity Music Festival

With this pledge of $500 and above you will be listed on the Community Unity Music Festival Facebook Page as a Neighbor of the Festival and will receive a handwritten thank you letter from the Community Unity Music Festival Committee. You will also have a reservation on the guest list for (2) to attend our official Meet and Greet immediately after the festival as well as (2) seats in our VIP section at the festival. 

$100- Associates of the Community Unity Music Festival

With a  pledge of $100 and above you, as an Associate of the Community Unity Music Festival,  will receive (1) complimentary ticket to sit in the reserved VIP section of the festival. 

$50 - Giver of Hope 

With a generous pledge of $50 and above you will be given a commemorative ink pen as a token of appreciation from our festival committee. 

$25- Cheerful Giver

With a healthy donation of $25 and above you will receive a letter of gratitude from our Founder Mrs. Carol Mitchell Faulkner herself!

I must say, "WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT TO MAKE THIS DAY A REALITY!"


If in fact we do not meet our goal, our funds will still go toward giving the scholarships to the students. The more money we raise the more assistance we can provide. Our goal is to one day award FULL scholarships to students and we will dedicate our lives to making this dream come true.  

Last year our festival was a major success and it was because of the help from our worldwide community that we were able to have a powerful day of awareness. Making a music festival is really challenging especially coming from a family of musicians and management. We usually get invited to perform at festivals and the background work is done way in advance. Seeing the work that needs to be done and having the young people as a point of inspiration is what keeps us going because there are many moments when you want to give up. I will speak for our team and say that giving up isn't an option when you have talent that is overlooked and unappreciated in these young moguls in the making. 

To put it simply, "WE NEED YOUR HELP"! 

  • Use the share tools to spread the word on every social media outlet there is. 
  • Every piece counts and I promise that you will remember the look on that child's face when they receive their first pair of drum sticks or the first lesson that leads to your child playing your favorite song.  


OUR COMMITTEE WOULD LIKE TO EXTEND ITS DEEPEST HEARTFELT THANKS FOR YOUR SUPPORT AND ENCOURAGEMENT. WITHOUT THE COMMUNITY OUR COMMUNITY THE MUSIC HAS NO MEANING. 

PEACE AND LOVE TO YOU ALL!

story:
“Be brave enough to live life creatively. The creative place where no one else has ever been...”  -Alan Alda, Actor, director, screenwriter, and author

Hello Everyone!

Thank you for visiting my IndieGogo page!

This year I had the amazing opportunity to record an album…and its almost ready!!

The album, called In the Place of In Between, is a collection of songs about love and its many aspects—the highs and the lows, the silly and the serious, and of course, everything “in between”.

The songs are written by me, my producer Charlie Lewis, and songwriters Anna Hill, Britta Linburg, Alysia Rogers, and Donna Ulisse. 

Here is a link to some of the songs in the album: 

https://soundcloud.com/pbanikmusic/sets/in-between

A little about me and why I did this:

I love music, being creative, and sharing that creativity with the world!  That is the short story…

Here’s the long story: 

My journey with music started as a first grader, singing during my first performance at a Bengali cultural festival.  From there it grew to doing more performances, taking voice lessons, joining my school’s choir and spring musical, singing in jazz clubs, and even co-founding and leading a South Asian fusion a capella group at my college.   Along with music however, I was also balancing academics pretty heavily, and doing both…was tough!  

After graduating college three years ago, I took a little break from the school life and finally decided to explore more of my love for music.  I did open mics and joined musician-networking groups and ended up meeting a musician and producer named Charlie Lewis.  Charlie had some songs that he wanted a vocalist for, and I wanted to get my start on songwriting.  Together we decided to make an album—a dream I’ve had for a long time!

Making this album was an AWESOME experience and a great way to spend my last year before starting the next phase of my life—medical school.  And it was an AMAZING learning experience.  I now understand the many steps involved in making an album and promoting music…and have tremendous respect for people who pursue music and the arts as their living! :)

With this little intro, I hope you have a better glimpse of who I am and why I made this album. 

I would love to have your support in helping me finish the album!

What will your donation help fund?

Making an album involves many steps!

Your contribution will help cover the costs of making the album from start to finish!  Specifically it will help towards:

Renting recording studio space and resources

Working with Charlie Lewis as my producer

Mixing, editing, and mastering the tracks

CD manufacturing

Album cover photography and artwork

Your Impact

Helping me reach my goal will not only allow me to finish the album, but also encourage all other musicians and creative minds out there that want to do something with their passion to GO for it!  I firmly believe in living life to the fullest and helping other people do so!

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this video with your friends and family and spread the love!

Also, please be sure to check out samples of my music in the link below! 

https://soundcloud.com/pbanikmusic/sets/in-between

story: Rock Of Salvation is a Christian Rock Band that has written original songs that are ready for the studio, CD production, and distribution to our audience. The selling of CD's will significantly assist the band to pay for operation expenses and facilitate continued positive listening opportunities for their fan base.

story:
Two By Chance - "Every Door" CD Release

Two By Chance was formed in 2012 in Northern Colorado and has been recording their debut album, "Every Door", which is now ready for release!!!  Members are: Todd Miramon (vocals/guitar), Marcy Miramon (Vocals/Keyboards), Jay Harper (Drums), Bijay Adhikari (Guitar), and Dennis Wells (Bass).

"Every Door" is a 13 song album with mostly original music  about the ups and downs of life we all go through.  The album has been recorded, mixed and mastered and now we need your help to release it to the public.  We invite you to be a part of our musical journey and hope you come along for the ride!!!

What We Need & What You Get

  • Our goal is to reach $3,500.  This will cover the cost of the printing of the CD's, paying off the cost of the mixing & mastering of the album, as well as purchasing  merchandise to help promote our album. 
  • We have several perks you can choose from.  Everything from an advanced copy of the CD  to obtaining rare songs that have yet to be released.   There is also a perk for a personal live performance in your home!!!
  • If we do not make our goal, the funds raised will be used for the duplication of the CD in order to get it released. (The band will then make homemade T-Shirts with sharpies and crayons!! Please don't let this happen!! ha ha ha).

The Impact

  • With your help, we can fulfill our dream of releasing our debut album and sharing our original music with the world!!!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, there are other ways you can help such as:

  • Spread the word to your friends on facebook (or any other social media site) by using the Indiegogo share tools and make some noise about our campaign!!!

And that's the way the cookie crumbles!!! Thanks your for your support.
